title: Makindi Shieldmate

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (White) each night.
- (1) Defend target player, redirecting all attackers against them to yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You gain a +1/+1 counter for each Gatherer, including yourself, that exists when the game begins. You gain another whenever a Gatherer is revived by any means.
- You are unable to use the factional attack until you are the last living Gatherer.
